<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_656484_virtual_a.get_scanner_img</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>get_scanner_img</name><script><![CDATA[var get_scanner_img = Class.create();
get_scanner_img.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	get_img: function(){
var scan = new GlideRecord('x_656484_virtual_a_scanner');

scan.query();
// Write a log message for each overdue NeedIt Task Record
while(scan.next()){
	gs.info(scan.modello);
	gs.info(scan.immagine);

}
	},
    type: 'get_scanner_img'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-06-25 14:34:51</sys_created_on><sys_id>6b4cec582f4130109d70b8e72799b66c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>get_scanner_img</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Virtual Agent" source="x_656484_virtual_a">926322ef2f70b0109d70b8e72799b668</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Virtual Agent">926322ef2f70b0109d70b8e72799b668</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_6b4cec582f4130109d70b8e72799b66c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-06-25 14:34:51</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
